metatags.twitter:title: Verbling has been acquired. | Jake Jolis | 26 comments
metatags.og:title: Verbling has been acquired. | Jake Jolis | 26 comments
metatags.og:description:
Verbling has been acquired.

It takes Herculean efforts to achieve what Verbling has done, and I am extremely grateful for the team members (current and former) who took a chance on an initially tiny project that went onto disrupt an industry.

Through their efforts, Verbling has facilitated over 200 years of total live language instruction, helped millions of people become fluent, and paid out many many millions to teachers all across the world.

My endless gratitude also goes out to our large community of learners, our teachers who dedicate their lives to their mission, our investors who believed in us and supported us, and our friends, family, and loved ones who stuck with us through the process.

Super proud of having played a part, and mostly grateful for the contributions of these people.

In one funny memory of which there are of course countless, this photo is from our presentation to the Princess of Sweden.

Excited for what is still to come from this talented group: https://lnkd.in/eKEhk7u | 26 comm

metatags.og:description: Video chats with random strangers often carry the risk of an unexpected, NSFW surprise. Verbling has something better in mind: Learning a foreign language by chatting with native speakers who also want to learn the language you speak.
